alert.note: Alert for North Zone Bridger Teton NF and Grand Teton NP; Salt and Wyoming Ranges, West Zone Bridger Teton NF; West Wind River Mountains, East Zone Bridger Teton NF (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 03 at 1:14PM MDT until September 04 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT SUNDAY... The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM MDT Sunday. the Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * IMPACTS: Low Humidities...Unseasonably Hot Temperatures...and Strong Gusty Winds will create erratic fire behavior with new fire starts possible. * AFFECTED AREA: In Northwest WY Fire Zone....415. In West Central WY Fire Zones...414...416. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central WY...Fremont. In North Central WY...Park. In West Central WY...Lincoln...Sublette...Teton. * WIND: West 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * HUMIDITY: As low as 14 percent. * TEMPERATURES: Highs in the lower 80s.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: North Zone Bridger Teton NF and Grand Teton NP; Salt and Wyoming Ranges, West Zone Bridger Teton NF; West Wind River Mountains, East Zone Bridger Teton NF
